scripts.dev:app:build: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env --profile app build portal
scripts.dev:app: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env --profile app up -d portal
scripts.dev:app:deps: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env --profile app exec portal sh -lc "pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --filter @archpad/portal..."
scripts.dev:all: docker compose --project-name archpad --env-file ../.env --profile backend --profile app --profile observability up -d
